de.unisb.cs.st.javaslicer.slicing

Class Slicer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unisb.cs.st.javaslicer.slicing.Slicer

  • public class Slicer
extends Object
    This is the new slicer implementation, built on top of the DependencesExtractor. There still exists another implementation DirectSlicer which is more efficient and should yield the same result. Nevertheless it is less maintained, so be warned.
    Author:
    Clemens Hammacher
